Class HUD

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koucha.experimentalgame.HUD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject, Renderable, Updatable

    public class HUD
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObject
    Heads up display

    Displays infos as an overlay over the game graphics
